reviews.review_msg: The Best Porf in Philosophy.  (it is sad that she is not teaching in summer)  Good explaination and teaching tech.  Her requirement are a little high.  But if you really paid attention to her explaination, the concepts are not that complicate.

her exams are brutal. there's no point in reading her class notes, cuz they're so vague. the only way to do well on her exams, is too be a TA. doesn't test on the "big picture", only really deep concepts. very tricky sentence structures. if you want a high GPA, don't take this course.

i took both phil001 and 100, 001 is easier than 100.but final is sucks,so tricky.100 is a writing course, the essay grading is not fair. good luck to you if you have a angel ta. these courses ruined my gpa. Dr. Mc is a killer......
